ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Shared view link access (in incognito) redirects to sign-in page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? Observed on `develop` branch; works fine in `master` - create shared view - access link in incognito mode - redirects to sign in page ``` authMiddleware :: Unauthorized [Error]: Unauthorized access at Function.unauthorized (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/meta/helpers/catchError.ts:44:11) at authMiddleware (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/meta/helpers/ncMetaAclMw.ts:38:17) at /Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/meta/helpers/catchError.ts:6:20 at Layer.handle [as handle_request] (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/node_modules/express/lib/router/layer.js:95:5) at next (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/node_modules/express/lib/router/route.js:144:13) at exports.default (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/meta/helpers/extractProjectIdAndAuthenticate.ts:144:5) ``` ### Desired Behavior access should work without redirection to sign-in page ### Project Details - In develop ### Attachements _No response_
